node_info.name: readWriteFile
node_info.description: Read or write files from the computer that runs n8n

properties.displayName: Use this node to read and write files on the same computer running n8n. To handle files between different computers please use other nodes (e.g. FTP, HTTP Request, AWS).
properties.name: info
operation
properties.description: Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n

options.name: Read File(s) From Disk
options.description: Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n

options.name: Write File to Disk
options.description: Create a binary file on the computer that runs n8n

properties.name: fileSelector
properties.description: Specify a file's path or path pattern to read multiple files. Always use forward-slashes for path separator even on Windows.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Extension of the file in the output binary
properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

options.name: fileExtension
options.description: Extension of the file in the output binary

options.name: fileName
options.description: Name of the file in the output binary

options.name: mimeType
options.description: Mime type of the file in the output binary

options.name: dataPropertyName
options.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: Path and name of the file that should be written. Also include the file extension.

properties.name: dataPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written

operations.name: Read File(s) From Disk
operations.description: Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n

operations.name: Write File to Disk
operations.description: Create a binary file on the computer that runs n8n

info.displayName: Use this node to read and write files on the same computer running n8n. To handle files between different computers please use other nodes (e.g. FTP, HTTP Request, AWS).

possibleValues.name: Read File(s) From Disk

notices.name: info
notices.text: Use this node to read and write files on the same computer running n8n. To handle files between different computers please use other nodes (e.g. FTP, HTTP Request, AWS).

hints.text: The name of the output binary field to put the file in
The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
